It was just through those doors.

Today, please.

He slipped out.

You're full of shit.

This is ridiculous.

Take them up to three.
[Ray] Hang on.

-No, our imaging lab's on the third floor. -[Ray] No, no, no.

-What's your name, baby? -Anne.

Abby was her name.

Periwinkle. You remember? Because that's Joanne's favorite shell.

you've kidnapped my family, and you've done something to 'em.

-[officer 1] Well, where's your family? -[Ray] They're right there. Just--

We're gonna be here all fuckin' night.
-[Ray] Search the hospital! -[officer 1] Okay, that's not happening.

-I'll see if I can track her down. -[Ray] Thank you.
Okay.
-[sighs] -[Berthram] Mr. Monroe,

Let's go, then.
Call if you need backup.
It's Peri's.

Jo gave it to me.

[officer 1] Can I see it, please?

Gentle.

it's not uncommon to be confused or to mix things up,

No, no, no.

[woman] Hello, Ray.

[sighs] I am not crazy.

-I doubt that. -You should think about listening, man.

Come on, then.

Oh, finally.

[sniffles] It wasn't a car accident.
She fell at a construction site.
Okay, sorry, I only know what's in here. Maybe you could tell me what you remember.

This proves that they were here...
and that they are hiding them.
He's just hiding everything--

She was your first wife? It's not got anything to do with Abby.

Eight years ago.
Why don't you tell me what happened?

[stammers] She-- It was a head-on collision.
Car accident?
[Ray] Yeah.
This has nothing to do with this...
or my family now.

had you been drinking?
-[Abby] Ray! Ray! [screams] -[glass shatters]

You didn't see it.
Nothing could help her.
I couldn't.

did you tell the staff that you were waiting for Abby, Ray?

[sobbing] Abby died in a car accident eight years ago,

Every day. It just...
-[sniffles, takes a deep breath] -All right.
I'm gonna say something,
and it's gonna be hard to hear.

because I believe you.
I believe something happened to Peri and Joanne...

I think we should take a look at the spot
where Peri had her accident.

translation.en: If you'll excuse me for a moment, hmm?

translation.en: He's confused.
I suggest going back to the place he claims his daughter was hurt.

translation.en: What are you thinking?
They might still be out there.
[Berthram] Oh, God.
I'll, uh, put a call into the canine unit and see if they can meet us -at the gas station. -[Jacobs] Mm-hmm.

-Of course. -[Ray] They're not out there.
translation.it: - Sarebbe meglio se venisse. - Certo. Non sono là.

translation.en: Maybe you're all in on this, or maybe you're not.

translation.en: and that's what happened.
[officer 1] Is that it, up ahead?
Yeah.
[officer 1] Thanks for coming so quickly. [officer 3] No problem. What have you got?

Ray, where did your daughter fall?
[officer 3] Got a scent source for Mandy?

[officer 3] Good girl. Good girl.
-[Jacobs] What happened here, Ray? -Nothing.
Just, Peri lost a compact, you know? This tiny toy mirror,

me and Jo, we looked for it. She looked in the bathroom, I looked in the car, and then...

-Hey! -[officer 2] No more.

translation.en: I know that she just wants me to try harder. And I do try hard!
translation.it: So che non è felice, che vuole che mi impegni di più. E io ci provo!

translation.en: I told Peri, "Just stay there." Right? "Just stay right there."
translation.it: Ho detto a Peri: "Resta lì. Ferma".

translation.en: And she didn't listen, and she should have listened!
translation.it: Non mi ha ascoltato, avrebbe dovuto farlo.

translation.en: So you were angry with her.
Yeah, I was angry. I picked up a rock, and I threw it.
translation.it: Sì, e ho lanciato un sasso.

translation.en: At who?
[sobs] At-- [stammers] At the dog.
I tried hard.
I tried really hard to-- to-- to- to grab her.
She still fell.
are you sure there was a dog?
translation.it: sei sicuro che ci fosse un cane?

translation.en: [Jacobs] There was no dog, was there, Ray?
translation.it: Non c'era nessun cane, vero, Ray?

translation.en: There was no accident.
Peri didn't fall.
-You made that all up. -[Ray mutters]
It happened!
It's-- That's all that happened.
[Jacobs] Think, Ray.
You were upset at your daughter,
angry at your wife,
angry at yourself.
So you picked up a rock.
translation.it: Allora tu... hai raccolto un sasso.

translation.en: [Jacobs] When it was over,
you were so angry at yourself at what you'd done...
translation.it: eri così furioso con te stesso per quel che avevi fatto...

translation.en: Then Joanne appears.
[Jo] Ray!
[Jacobs] So you... lash out.
[Jo screams] No! No!
That's what happened, isn't it, Ray?
-Are you hurt? -[Jacobs] The mind, Ray,
it can sometimes create an alternate reality, a false reality,
translation.it: a volte può creare una realtà alternativa, una falsa realtà,

translation.en: to shield itself from trauma.
-[Peri screams] -[Jacobs] From the things we fear,
from the horrors we can't even imagine.
Is it broken?
[Jacobs] You lost your family once before,
and when you saw what you'd done to Peri...
translation.it: e, quando hai visto cosa avevi fatto a Peri,

translation.en: and then Joanne,
your mind couldn't accept the fact that it had happened all over again.
translation.it: la tua mente si è rifiutata di accettare che fosse successo di nuovo.

translation.en: And at your hands.
I would never hurt you, sweetie.
translation.it: Non ti farei mai del male, tesoro.

translation.en: Where are they, Ray?
Where are Peri and Joanne?
Where did you put them?
Ray?
[officer 1] Stand up, Mr. Monroe.
Stand up, Mr. Monroe!
Stand up.
Get up, right now.
Mr. Monroe, you are under arrest for the suspicion of murder.
translation.it: Sig. Monroe, è in arresto con l'accusa di omicidio.

translation.en: -You have the right to remain silent. -[Mandy barking]
translation.it: Ha il diritto di non parlare.

translation.en: Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law.
translation.it: Quel che dirà potrà essere usato contro di lei in tribunale.

translation.en: You have the right to an attorney. If you can not afford an attorney,
translation.it: Ha diritto a un avvocato. Se non può permetterselo...

translation.en: [Peri] Daddy!
[Ray] Don't move.
It's going to be okay. I'm just gonna scare him.
Daddy!
-[Peri screams] -No!
[Ray] Are you hurt?
I don't think so.
It happened.
[Jacobs] No, Ray!
Put it down. Put it down. Put down all your guns.
-Okay-- -[Ray] Do it now. Now!
Now!
Put down your guns and your radios and kick 'em away.
translation.it: Posate armi e radio e allontanatele.

translation.en: -You too! -You know you're fucking yourself, right?
translation.it: Anche tu! Ti stai fottendo da solo.

translation.en: You stay up there. Right.
Now, everybody up. Everybody out!
You go, get out! Go on, go up!
Everybody up!
[Jacobs] I know you won't hurt me, Ray.
translation.it: So che non mi farai del male, Ray.

translation.en: You think that I've murdered my wife and my daughter.
translation.it: Se ho ucciso mia moglie e mia figlia,

translation.en: So who are you to me?
Now move it.
Move!
Come on, round the side. Now open that door.
All right, now get in. Everyone in.
Come on. Come on.
-Give me your key card. -[Jacobs] Ray...
if you thought seeing that dog
translation.it: se pensi che vedere quel cane

translation.en: somehow makes everything else you believe true, you are wrong.
translation.it: in qualche modo convalidi il resto della tua storia, ti sbagli.

translation.en: [Ray] Or you're wrong.
Give me the card.
-Mistake. -Well, we'll see.
translation.it: È un errore. Beh, lo vedremo.

translation.en: [officer 2] You motherfucker! You motherfucker! You're so fucked!
translation.it: Figlio di puttana! Sei nella merda!

translation.en: I'm coming for you.
-[man] Still seeing Phil from radiology? -[woman] I don't think so.
translation.it: - Vedi ancora Phil della Radiologia? - No, guarda.

translation.en: Pretty crazy, huh?
I mean, I'm afraid to even pick mine up, you know?
translation.it: Ho paura a prendere anche il mio, sa?

translation.en: -[babies crying] -What if I drop him?
So, is this your first?
[man] Sorry, Mr. Monroe. She's gone.

translation.en: [man] They're both gone.
-[monitor flatlines] -[doctor] That's it. Call it.
I'm sorry, Mr. Monroe. They're gone.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, sig. Monroe, sono morte.

[Jo, echoing] Do something.
-[nurse 1] Eighty-two degrees. -[indistinct chatter]
[nurse 2] Heads up.
Help me. Help me.
Help me, please.
Help.
-[woman] Doctor? Doctor! -[gasps]

[Ray] Thank you. Good work.
[Ray] Go!
-Just-- Just... -[alert buzzes]
-...stop. -[gun cocks]
Just stop. [panting]
I just want to get my family... and I want to go home.

translation.en: Just point the barrel away. All right?
Okay.
I'll take you to your family, all right?
-They're right downstairs. -[gasps]
Thirty seconds away.
[under breath] Give me... Give me the keys.
Yeah.
[low battery toy] I hope you feel better.
[Anne] EMS just brought in a couple head traumas.
Head-on collision. Drunk driver.
[Berthram] The most beautiful eyes I've ever seen.

translation.en: -[gasps] -[Jo] No.
Can I convince you to reconsider?
Don't touch her! Get back! Away from the table.

Take off your mask.
Take it off.
You're a monster.
You're all monsters.
Ray, don't do this.

Jo! Jo! Jo! Jo!

Ray... Ray...

You think you can cut up my family?

translation.en: You think you can just cut up my little girl?

Nobody needs to get hurt.
[Ray] Daddy's here.
Ray, you are deeply confused.
I'm not afraid of you.
Ray, don't do this, please.
[Jo] Ray... Ray...
They drugged us.
I know. Hold on to Peri.
[Lucado] Ray.
You're not seeing things clearly.
I've never felt more clear.
Come on, come on.
[Lucado] Hold him down!
Propofol, 15 milligrams!
[Ray] Oh, Jo, you're okay!
You're okay.
-I got you. I got you. -[elevator bell dings]

translation.en: -Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Stop! Stop! Stop! -Whoa, whoa!
Just get out of my way.
Mr. Monroe, listen to me. You gotta listen to me.
We can't let you leave. You can't leave here.

I'm Dr. Bruce Volk. Do you remember?

I did it.

I did it.

Yeah?

Soon, sweetheart.
Soon.

We are now.
